class.name: GDSqlite
class.description: Provides a GDSqlite instance that can be used to open/close/query SQLite databases.

method.name: opendb
method.description: Opens a database and returns it's ID number. Creates the database file if it doesn't exist. Accepts [b]only[/b] [code]user://[/code] paths. Returns [code]-1[/code] if failed to open database. Example: [codeblock] var sqlite = GDSqlite.new() var dbId = sqlite.opendb("user://database.db") [/codeblock]

method.name: closedb
method.description: Closes the database of ID specified. Returns [code]false[/code] if failed to close database. Example: [codeblock] sqlite.closedb(dbId) [/codeblock]

method.name: querydb
method.description: Query an [b]open[/b] database using it's ID number. [codeblock] var result = sqlite.querydb(db, "SELECT * FROM mytable;") print(result) [/codeblock]
